definition: to feign/to pretend
fake/false/artificial/to borrow/if/suppose
see 假掰[gei1 bai1]
vacation
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Tutti executed a fabulous fake faint, swooning cartoonishly right to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 圖蒂假裝暈倒，像卡通人物似的昏倒在地。

sentences.english: I just told him to pretend like I'd done a really bad fart.
sentences.chinese: 我就告訴他假裝我剛放了一個很醜的屁。

sentences.english: He deceived me by pretending to be a famous movie star.
sentences.chinese: 他假裝成電影明星，騙了我。

sentences.english: XuanZu pretends to zen to light the sea king, to test the courtiers faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 宣祖假裝要禪位給光海君，以此試探臣子們的忠心。

sentences.english: I just went to an online marriage site and pretended Alice was human.
sentences.chinese: 我剛纔到網上婚姻的網站和假裝雅麗氏是人類。

sentences.english: Ann: Honestly, there are so many beggars who are pretended to cheat the passerby.
sentences.chinese: 老實說，很多乞丐都是假裝的，以此來騙路人的錢。

sentences.english: On stage, she bleeds from simulated stab wounds.
sentences.chinese: 在舞臺上，她假裝自己戳出一處傷口然後噴血。

sentences.english: You’re like a fake, ’’ she said, “faking being well.
sentences.chinese: “你就像一個騙子，”她說，“假裝自己很好。

sentences.english: It would be idle to pretend the system is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 假裝系統完美無疵是徒勞的。

sentences.english: Pretending to offer help, so that he could find out what Malfoy's up to?
sentences.chinese: 假裝要幫忙，以便發現馬爾福在幹什麼？

sentences.english: Just pretend, ” I told them, and they did.
sentences.chinese: 只須假裝就行了，”我告訴他們，他們照做了。

sentences.english: His attendants pretended to pick up the long train at the back of his cloak.
sentences.chinese: 侍從們假裝拾起皇帝披風后那長長的後裾。

sentences.english: Lincoln was very surprised, but he pretended to be calm.
sentences.chinese: 林肯非常驚訝，但是他假裝鎮靜自若。

sentences.english: Jack asks the Palmers to pretend that the Senator was killed.
sentences.chinese: 傑克向帕默一家人請求，假裝帕默在爆炸中喪生了。

sentences.english: Pretending to understand what you actually did not may just bring yourself embarrassment or even disgrace.
sentences.chinese: 沒有聽懂而假裝聽懂，可能會讓你尷尬甚至丟醜。

sentences.english: He went to Madame Carp's shop and pretended to help Anneliese.
sentences.chinese: 他到了卡帕女士的商店，假裝來幫助安妮絲。

definition: perhaps/maybe
sometimes/now and then
actually/in fact/really
this kind of/so/this way/like this/such
counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
occasionally/once in a while/sometimes
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
they/them (for females)
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
